comments.value: #This is Lord&Taylor promotional shipping requirements for customers.Feature:

steps.name: Account page should display greeting message

elements.name: 1. Free shipping OVER $49 purchase from Beauty

steps.name: User navigate Beauty department to Exfoliators category
User click on Lancome exfoliator product
User select Lancome product size as "3.4 OZ."
User select Lancome product quantity as "2"
User verify totalItems on LancomeBagPage as "Items (2)"
User verify product name on LancomeBagPage as "Comforting Exfoliating Cream/3.4 oz."
User verify subTotal on LancomeBagPage as "$52.00"
User verify estimatedTotal on LancomeBagPage as "$61.95"

steps.name: User click checkout button on bagPage
Checkout page should display Lancome products
User verify product name on LancomeCheckoutPage as "Comforting Exfoliating Cream/3.4 oz."
User verify product quantity on LancomeCheckoutPage as "2"
User verify itemTotal on LancomeCheckoutPage as "$52.00"
User verify shipping on LancomeCheckoutPage as "FREE"
User verify verify tax on LancomeCheckoutPage as "$0.00"
User verify orderTotal on LancomeCheckoutPage as "$52.00"
Account page should display greeting message

elements.name: 2. No free shipping UNDER $49 purchase from Beauty

steps.name: User navigate Beauty department to Eyes category
User click on Shiseido Eye product
User select Shiseido product color as "Br602 Deep Brown"
User select Shiseido product quantity as "1"

result.error_message:

User verify product name on ShiseidoBagPage as "Natural Eyebrow Pencil/0.1 oz."
User verify subTotal on ShiseidoBagPage as "$20.00"
User verify estimatedTotal on ShiseidoBagPage as "$25.95"
User click checkout button on bagPage
Checkout page should display Shiseido products
User verify product name on ShiseidoCheckoutPage as "Natural Eyebrow Pencil/0.1 oz."
User verify product quantity on ShiseidoCheckoutPage as "1"
User verify itemTotal on ShiseidoCheckoutPage as "$20.00"
User verify shipping on ShiseidoCheckoutPage as "$5.95"
User verify verify tax on ShiseidoCheckoutPage as "$0.00"
